metadata.title: CVE-2024-1547 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Through a series of API calls and redirects, an attacker-controlled alertdialog could have been displayed on another website (with the victimwebsite's URL shown). This vulnerability affects Firefox < 123, Firefox ESR< 115.8, and Thunderbird < 115.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
